lines.content: * Main class for starting the Thorndike chatbot application.
* The main method that initializes and starts the Thorndike chatbot.
* @param args The command-line arguments (not used in this application).
* Thorndike - A simple chatbot for managing tasks and user interactions.
* Constructs a Thorndike chatbot and initializes necessary components.
* It sets up the user interface, task list, and handles potential file I/O
* Starts the Thorndike chatbot and enters the main interaction loop.
* It displays a greeting message and listens for user commands until the
ui.print("What can I do for you?");
* Represents a command to add a task to the task list.
* Constructs a CmdAddTask object with the task to be added.
* @param task The task to be added to the task list.
* Executes the command to add the task to the task list.
* @param taskList The task list to which the task should be added.
* @param ui       The user interface for displaying feedback to the user.
public void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui) {
ui.print("Got it. I've added this task:");
ui.print(String.format("Now you have %d tasks in the list.", taskList.size()));
* Represents a command to exit the application.
* Executes the command to exit the application and displays a farewell message.
* @param taskList Not used in this command.
* @param ui       The user interface for displaying the farewell message.
public void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui) {
ui.print("Bye meow! Hope to see you again soon!");

* Represents a command to find tasks matching a keyword in the task list.
